pullRequest.title: timeout should propagate to OkHttp
pullRequest.bodyText:
fixes #2013
Had to move the timeout test into the same package to avoid making the getClientForRequest method public. Now RouteResourceClientHCTest.java has only integration tests going towards localhost.

commit.message: test if timeout propagates to OkHttp

nodes.bodyText: This does not run agains graphhopper.com? do we need the parameterization here?

commit.message: make test a bit shorter via ValueSource
